nodes.documentation:
Add a bid 
This can be called only if the user is outbidding the highest bid
Bidders total balance is tracked
nodes.name: addBid

nodes.documentation:
Function to get the bid amount for a bidder
returns the latest most Highest bid only
nodes.name: getBidAmount

nodes.documentation: Function returns all the bids from an address
nodes.name: getPendingAmount

nodes.documentation: Balance is reduced as the winning bid goes to Name holder
nodes.name: adjustBalanceOnWinning

nodes.documentation:
In case money transfer fails and bid is already removed from system
This function adds it back in without changing the topBidder or price
nodes.name: addDefunctBid
